EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Container Service (PKS), How Banks Can Stop Cyber Criminals, and Embracing a Hybrid Cloud Model
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
august 31, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/introducing-pivotal-container-service-pks-the-simple-way-to-bring-kubernetes-to-enterprise-customers?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Introducing Pivotal Container Service (PKS) We're excited to announce, in collaboration with VMware and Google, the launch of Pivotal Container Service™ (PKS). PKS is a commercially supported release of the open source Kubo project, adding two important new capabilities for Pivotal customers: a simple way to deploy and operate enterprise-grade Kubernetes, and a seamless mechanism to migrate to container-based workloads to run On-Premises on VMware vSphere and Google Cloud Platform. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/announcements/introducing-pivotal-container-service-pks-the-simple-way-to-bring-kubernetes-to-enterprise-customers?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/can-banks-stop-cyber-criminals-50050ea5d8d?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Can Banks Stop Cyber Criminals? How financial institutions can thwart intrusions with a two-pronged strategy of brute-force work and cutting-edge tools. Read Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/can-banks-stop-cyber-criminals-50050ea5d8d?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/private-and-public-the-best-of-both-clouds-7ae0d97ef085?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Private and Public: The Best of Both Clouds James Bayer explains why a hybrid cloud model that embraces both private and public clouds is key to business optionality and flexibility. Embark On a Hybrid Journey <[[https://builttoadapt.io/private-and-public-the-best-of-both-clouds-7ae0d97ef085?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/agile-strategy-roadmaps-with-joanna-beltowska-ep-77?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Agile Strategy & Roadmaps, with Joanna Beltowska (Ep. 77) In this episode, Coté talks with Joanna Beltowska on the topic of long-term planning in cloud-native organizations. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/agile-strategy-roadmaps-with-joanna-beltowska-ep-77?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/new-tech-papers-multi-site-pcf-and-accelerating-software-deployment?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> New Tech Papers: Multi-Site PCF and Accelerating Software Deployment Jared Ruckle breaks down two new white papers on that will explain concepts and features that will help your deploys. Each paper features diagrams, reference architectures, and best practices from the most advanced adopters of Pivotal Cloud Foundry and microservices. Check It Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/new-tech-papers-multi-site-pcf-and-accelerating-software-deployment?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Reduce Risk in the Enterprise Everything you've ever wanted to know about cloud-native security, and why your team needs to adopt this approach.
